home.tagline:
Unofficial Need for Speed Interactive Maps
(Currently under development)

controls.resetInvisConfirm: This will reset all invisible/tracked markers to their default state (visible), are you sure?
controls.backupSave:
This will download a backup copy of all Need for Speed Map settings.

The file will be saved as: __fileName__

Are you sure?
controls.backupHtmlFail: Sorry.  Restore is not possible.  This browser does not support HTML5 File APIs.

credits.botHelp: With help from __mcarver__, & other __contributors__. Thanks to __designGears__ & __hhrhhr__ for map & asset extraction. For the full list of Javascript libraries used, __jsCredits__.
credits.botAssets: Need for Speed, logo, icons, map & text are the property of __cdpr__

misc.contribute: Work in progress! Help appreciated at __link__
misc.helpTranslate: Want to help or improve translations?
misc.portraitWarn: Note: the map is best viewed in landscape mode, tap to dismiss
misc.nsfwConfirm: This will change 'Brothel' to 'Love Interest', are you sure?
misc.nsfwUndo: Are you sure you want to go back?
